game_welcome: 🧙‍♂️Welcome to the Halloween Survival Battle! Right-click to join this spooky party!💀
music_hint: 🎶Halloween music has started playing... Get ready!👻
block_cracking: ⚠️Blocks are about to crack randomly, watch your step!💥
player_joined: 🎮{{playerName}} joined the battle! {{count}} brave souls remaining!👤
player_left: 😱{{playerName}} got scared away! {{count}} brave souls remaining!🚪
game_time_minutes: ⏱️This round has been going for {{minutes}} minutes!📈
game_over_all_dead: 💀Game over! All souls have become ghosts! Halloween night wins!👻
game_over_single_player_win: 🏆{{playerName}} survived 5 minutes in Halloween night! You are a true survival master!🎉
game_over_single_player_time: 👤Single player mode over! {{playerName}} survived {{minutes}} minutes {{seconds}} seconds in the terrifying Halloween night!🎃
game_over_multiplayer_last: 👑Congratulations {{playerName}} for becoming the Halloween King! You defeated all demons and monsters!🔥
game_over_multiplayer_winners: 🎉Halloween party successfully ended! Congratulations to the brave survivors: {{players}}! You conquered fear!👻
player_died_with_remaining: 💀{{playerName}} was {{damageType}}, became a real ghost! {{count}} living souls remaining!🔢
skill_meow_trap_hit: 🐱You were hit by {{playerName}}'s Meow Trap skill, vision blurred for 10 seconds😵

gui.skill_status_ready: 🎮Available (Left-click to use in game, Right-click to check time)⏱️
gui.game_features: 🦇Bats appear in game, candy can repair terrain🍬
gui.join_game_content: 🎮Join next round? Players joining within 10 seconds enter the same game!⏱️

history.title: 📜Your Game History:🎮
history.no_record: 📝No game records yet, start your first game now!🚀
history.error: ❌Unable to get history, please try again later.🕰️

player.joined_and_game_starting: 🎮{{playerName}} joined the game! Round starting in 10 seconds!⏱️

countdown.to_game_start: 🎃Halloween party starts in {{seconds}} seconds! Participant count: {{playerCount}}{{mode}}👻

game.start_message: 🎃Halloween battle begins! Ghosts, bats and pumpkin monsters are out! Good luck everyone!🦇
game.player_joined_starting: 🎮{{player}} joined the game! Round starting in 10 seconds!⏱️
game.countdown: 🎃Halloween party starts in {{countdown}} seconds! Participant count: {{players}}{{mode}}👻
game.game_started: 🎃Halloween battle begins! Ghosts, bats and pumpkin monsters are out! Good luck!👻
game.minutes_passed: ⏱️This round has been going for {{minutes}} minutes!📈
game.game_over_all_dead: 💀Game over! All souls have become ghosts! Halloween night wins!👻
game.single_player_victory: 🏆{{player}} survived 5 minutes in Halloween night! You are a true survival master!🎉
game.single_player_end: 👤Single player mode over! {{player}} survived {{minutes}}m {{seconds}}s in the terrifying Halloween night!🎃
game.multi_player_victory: 👑Congratulations {{player}} for becoming the Halloween King! You defeated all demons and monsters!🔥
game.multi_player_end: 🎉Halloween party ended! Congratulations to the brave survivors: {{players}}! You conquered fear!👻
game.player_ghost_remaining: 💀{{player}} was {{damageType}}, became a real ghost! {{remaining}} living souls remaining!🔢
game.welcome: 🎃Welcome to the Halloween Survival Battle! Right-click to join this spooky party!👻
game.halloween_music: 🎶Halloween music has started playing... Get ready!👻
game.bat_hit: 🦇You were hit by a bat and took damage!💥

game_start_countdown: ⏱️Game starts in {{countdown}} seconds! Current participants: {{count}} players{{mode}}👤

cat_trap.effect_start: 🐱You were hit by {{player}}'s Meow Trap skill, vision blurred for 10 seconds😵

old_shoes.name: 👟Old Man's Sprint Shoes🏃‍♂️
old_shoes.introduce: ⏱️Increases movement speed and jump height for 5 seconds💨
old_shoes.notice: 🚀Wear them to run faster and jump higher!🦘

dash.name: 🏃‍♂️Dash💨
dash.introduce: 🎯Dash towards crosshair direction, knocks back hit players💥
dash.notice: ⚠️Be careful not to dash too hard!🏃‍♂️

chorus_fruit.name: 🍇Chorus Fruit✨
chorus_fruit.introduce: 🎲Randomly teleport to existing blocks on platform (Lucky Charm)🔀
chorus_fruit.notice: ⚠️You might teleport to blocks with cracking warnings!🧱

bounce_tnt.name: 💣Bounce TNT↩️
bounce_tnt.introduce: 🦇Bounces all TNT and bats within 4 block range💣
bounce_tnt.notice: 👥Essential team survival tool, also bounces annoying bats!🛡️

safe_platform.name: 🛟Rescue Platform🧱
safe_platform.introduce: 🌌When falling into void, generates 5×5 platform at bottom yellow layer to save you🛟
safe_platform.notice: 🔄This is a one-time passive skill! No activation needed!❌

cat_trap.name: 🐱Meow Trap🕳️
cat_trap.introduce: 🐱Gives all other players within 10 blocks Meow effect for 10 seconds😵
cat_trap.notice: 🐱What would you do with three days of meowing? Answer: Let's learn to meow together🎤

spider_man.name: 🕷️Spider-Man🦸‍♂️
spider_man.introduce: 🕸️Shoots web and bounces to target location, pulls when hitting players or entities🎯
spider_man.notice: 🕷️Move freely in the arena like Spider-Man! Be careful not to fall!⚠️

self_sustain.name: 💪Self-Sustain❤️
self_sustain.introduce: ⏱️Restores HP every 5 seconds, recovery amount gradually increases up to 5 points📈
self_sustain.notice: 🔄This is a passive skill! No activation needed!❌

skill.spider_man.web_pull_hit: 🕸️You were touched by {{playerName}}'s web and pulled over!👥

skill.cat_trap.effect_start: 🐱You were hit by {{player}}'s Meow Trap skill, vision blurred for 10 seconds😵
